name: Joy (Spongey Kitty)
description:
TW : the game is suitable for Mature Audiences only, so please be careful.

It was supposed to be an easy burglary for Eli, just like all the others in the past.

And yet--

How in the world did he end up in such an absurd situation?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Joy is a narrative BL game made in RPGMaker MZ for Windows. It contains heavy themes and a lot of reading. Please only play it if you're fine with that.

We hope you will enjoy it!
